name: Java Jungle
description:
This was a student game made in 2020 with a small group.

https://www.artstation.com/lycheepudding is the main character creator, along with concept artist and other assets/textures
https://www.artstation.com/devoidedwalker was the main animator, along with a few asset creations and textures
https://www.artstation.com/maxphoenix was one of the main asset creators

Dominic Chang https://www.linkedin.com/in/dominic-c/?originalSubdomain=au
Jarred Lenton https://www.linkedin.com/in/jarred-lenton-8243181b3/

and finally, the amazing Ayden Rolfe was the programmer who brought this all together. https://www.linkedin.com/in/aydenrolfe/
